mods.abstract: William Strickland's handwritten description of the discovery of an iceberg on his voyage from Liverpool to Philadelphia.

The sketchbook details William Strickland's visit to Europe in 1838. In January 1838, Strickland sailed for Liverpool. The Strickland family was away from Philadelphia for about 6 months. During their tour, the family visited England, France, Italy and Germany. In June 1838, the Strickland family returned home to Philadelphia.
